page.title: 19PUBLIC UTILITIES-PRESTWICH
page.content:
The sewage works, built in 1898, cater for the needs of Prestwich.There are four processes needed to clean the sewage and make it ready to be pumped into the River Irwell. The solid effluent is taken by tankers to the sewage works at Bolton where it is made into methane gas. It is a small plant employing five men.
Agecroft power station is situated in the suburbs of Manchester.It has been going for over a hundred years and at one time was one of the biggest in England.It is the main supplier of electricity in Manchester,thus it is deliberatly situated near a coal mine,the River Irwell and also relatively close to a densely populated area.
